title: Suggestions for a sans serif to use on a business card with Mishka
content:
Hi,

Does anyone have any suggestions for a sans serif typeface to use on a business card to use with Mishka ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/")) I used Mishka for the logo. It's for a fictional Odwalla/Naked-esque juice brand and the person we are designing the card for is the founder, who is a doctor.

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
Not a sans, but seems like a cool match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kursivschrift/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819201154/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kursivschrift/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kursivschrift/")

hhp
Will give it a shot! Thanks! Much appreciated!
